alert.note: Alert for Colquitt; Grady; Mitchell; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 4:12AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Grady, southeastern Mitchell, northern Thomas and southwestern Colquitt Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 412 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cairo, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cairo, Moultrie, Ochlocknee, Coolidge, Whigham, Funston, Akridge, Grady Co A/p, Capel, Autreyville, Center Hill, Chastain, Spence, Dawesville, Moultrie Municipal A/P, Quality, Pine Park, Hartsfield, Bay and Pasco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
